'''Strike of Fortune''' is [[Bennett]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*Bennett's Plunging Attack is identical to that of [[Albedo]]'s [[Favonius Bladework - Weiss]], and is marginally faster than other sword users.

==Trivia==
*Bennett's [[Normal Attack]] animations are strikingly similar to [[Kaeya]]'s Normal Attack.
*Bennett's [[Charged Attack]] animation is entirely similar to [[Traveler|Aether]]'s Charged Attack.
